title: Europe emerges as hotspot for Indian IT M&As, tops buy chart
description: Indian IT giants are on a European shopping spree, snapping up companies at a rapid clip. Europe's booming tech sector, outpacing North America, has fueled over a dozen acquisitions since the Covid pandemic.
content: Indian outsourcing leaders are increasingly acquiring companies in Europe, where the pace of revenue expansion has lately dwarfed growth rates the other side Atlantic seaboard to justify about a dozen M&As in the continent since the pandemic.
cleaned_content: indian outsourcing leaders are increasingly acquiring companies in europe where the pace of revenue expansion has lately dwarfed growth rates the other side atlantic seaboard to justify about a dozen m as in the continent since the pandemic
